items.summary: Execute Rollout 21.7 build/upgrade deployment as described in `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` Step 9.5, preserving all existing canister state and ensuring the build/deploy pipeline completes successfully (no platform error "Unable to create your app").
After the Rollout 21.7 canister upgrade, execute the post-upgrade smoke test checklist in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md` using both an admin user and a non-admin approved member user.

Record the Rollout 21.7 smoke test outcomes in `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` under the “Rollout 21.7 Smoke Test Results” section, using clear English notes for any failures (include route, user role, and observed error text).
